job_title: Administrative Assistant in Eaton Rapids, MI
pros: Pros for working at ERMC, it is a small hospital where you work closely with everyone and get to know your fellow coworkers well. Great benefits, learned a lot about hospital administration and how a rural hospital is run.
cons: Cons would be they overreact on the littlest infractions without proper write up and that leads to firing. They do not listen to the employees well enough, and will gaslight you if you try to stick up for yourself. Upper management should not be trusted, the whole breaking down silos is just talk. There's not much improvement going forward with administration in the hospital. You will have to walk around on eggshells to work for Eaton Rapids Medical Center, and no room for growth within the company. Document every interaction you have. They like to use threatening behaviors to get you to fall in line. Also, it is a rural hospital the culture is very rural and not LGBTQ friendly.

job_title: Denials Management Specialist in Eaton Rapids, MI
pros: Great health insurance, best places to work committee, many other great benefits at a low cost.

cons: Pay is less than most places for the same role and opportunities for growth are not as plentiful since it is a small hospital.
